comment_blocked_info: This comment has been blocked. It is not visible anymore.
comment_pending_info: This comment has to be validated by a manager before being visible.
delete_comment_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this comment ?
delete_entry_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this entry [%title%] ?
delete_field_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to remove this field [%name%] ?
delete_keyword_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to remove this keyword [%name%] ?
delete_selected_entries: {1} Delete selected entry|[2,Inf[ Delete selected entries
delete_selected_entries_confirm_message: {1} Are you sure you want to delete the selected entry ?|[2,Inf[ Are you sure you want to delete the selected entries ?
entry_addition_in_category: Addition of an entry in category [%name%] of database [%clacoform%]
entry_addition_in_category_msg:
Entry [%title%] has been added in category [%category%] of database [%clacoform%].

The entry is available here.
entry_addition_success_message: The entry has been successfully created.
entry_categories_edition: Edition of categories of an entry
entry_edition_in_category: Edition of an entry of category [%name%] of database [%clacoform%]
entry_edition_in_category_msg:
Entry [%title%] from database [%clacoform%] from category [%category%] has been edited.

The entry is available here.
entry_removal_from_category: Removal of an entry from category [%name%] of database [%clacoform%]
entry_removal_from_category_msg: Entry [%title%] from database [%clacoform%] has been removed from category [%category%].
entry_title_info: Text that will be used as title for the entry.
label_max_entries: Number of allowed addition by user (0 = unlimited)
label_random_categories: Pick entries from the following categories
label_search_column_enabled: Allow to choose the displayed columns
label_search_restricted: Allow to restrict search on specific columns
label_votes_date: Allow votes between these two dates
no_field_alert_msg: No field has been configured. You can do it here :
no_manager_entry: You are the manager of no entry
no_own_entry: You haven't created an entry yet
not_configured_yet: The form is not configured yet.
rich_text_field_info: For the sake of readability, "Rich text" fields are not visible in the table of entries.
share_entry_msg: The users with who the entry is shared get the same rights as the author of the entry.
template_variables_message: You can use the following variables. They will be replaced by the corresponding field.
display_categories_help: The categories are always accessible to managers.
entry_creation_not_allowed: You cannot add a new entry in this database.
show_confirm: Confirm the submission of new entries
show_confirm_help: If checked, a confirmation request will be shown to users before submitting the entry.
confirm_new_entry_message: Are you sure you want to save this entry ?
help_message_help: The help message is displayed on all the entries of the database.
